Fall 2021 Schedule -- ONU Observatory

Sunday, Aug 22, 8:30-9:30 pm. -- ONU Event. "Welcomefest Meet-n-greet"

Friday, Sept 24, 8:30-10:30 pm. -- Public Event. "Jupiter and Saturn put on a show"

Friday, Oct 8, 8:00-10:00 pm.  -- Public Event.  "Draconid meteor shower"

Friday, Oct 29, 8:00-10:00 pm. -- Public Event. "Venus - high and bright"

Friday, Dec 3, 8:00-10:00 pm. -- Public Event. "Deep sky comets"

Mask required!
Maps to the ONU Observatory: https://jpastro/astro/ONUObservatory.html
For weather cancellations see: https://jpastro/astro/publicevents.html














Fall 2021 Schedule -- ONU Observatory

Sunday, Aug 22, 8:30-9:30 pm. -- ONU Event. "Welcomefest Meet-n-greet"

Friday, Sept 24, 8:30-10:30 pm. -- Public Event. "Jupiter and Saturn put on a show"

Friday, Oct 8, 8:00-10:00 pm.  -- Public Event.  "Draconid meteor shower"

Friday, Oct 29, 8:00-10:00 pm. -- Public Event. "Venus - high and bright"

Friday, Dec 3, 8:00-10:00 pm. -- Public Event. "Deep sky comets"

Mask required!
Maps to the ONU Observatory: https://jpastro/astro/ONUObservatory.html
For weather cancellations see: https://jpastro/astro/publicevents.html
